user_question: What certifications are required to become a certified dragon caretaker, and how can one obtain them?
final_answer: To become a certified dragon caretaker, one typically needs the Dragon Caretaker Certification (DCC) from the International Dragon Caretakers Association (IDCA). This involves completing a course on dragon biology, habitat management, and safety protocols, followed by a practical exam. Courses are available online and in select magical academies.
